title: A Knowledge Graph and Deep Learning-Based Semantic Recommendation Database System for Advertisement Retrieval and Personalization
summary: In modern digital marketing, the growing complexity of advertisement data demands intelligent systems capable of understanding semantic relationships among products, audiences, and advertising content. To address this challenge, this paper proposes a Knowledge Graph and Deep Learning-Based Semantic Recommendation Database System (KGSR-ADS) for advertisement retrieval and personalization.
